home_h1_1: Rooftop garden design that transforms your balcony experience
home_h2_3: Our leading rooftop garden design services
home_h2_4: Why choose Urban Balcony for rooftop garden design?
home_h3_7: Experts in transforming urban balconies into luxurious and designed retreat spaces
home_p_16: We at Urban Balcony believe that every urban balcony can become a personal sanctuary of tranquility and beauty. Our expertise in rooftop garden and small balcony design enables us to create unique solutions specially tailored for residents of the central region. We combine modern urban aesthetics with practical functionality, creating spaces that invite you to relax and connect with nature even in the heart of the city.
home_p_17: Our professional team specializes in planning and designing rooftop gardens suitable for the Israeli climate and urban lifestyle. We understand the unique challenges of small balconies and rooftops, and offer creative solutions that maximize every centimeter while maintaining an elegant and inviting appearance.
home_p_18: We offer comprehensive planning and design services that begin with understanding your needs and vision. Our team creates detailed plans including selection of suitable plants, smart irrigation solutions, and design of comfortable seating areas. Each project is customized to your budget and personal style.
home_p_19: Our professional planting ensures your garden will thrive over time. We select resilient plants suitable for the sun and wind conditions on your balcony, and provide ongoing maintenance services to keep your urban garden looking perfect.
home_p_20: We specialize in installing designed decks, quality flooring, and smart lighting systems that create a magical atmosphere in the evening hours. Our solutions combine weather resistance with elegant design that upgrades the entire space.
home_p_21: With years of experience in rooftop garden and urban balcony design, we bring professional knowledge and creativity to every project.
home_p_22: We believe in ecological gardening and use local plants and water-efficient irrigation systems.
home_p_23: Each project is specially designed for you, taking into account your personal style, budget, and unique needs.
home_p_24: We accompany you throughout the entire process, from initial consultation to ongoing maintenance, with a commitment to your satisfaction.
home_p_25: "Urban Balcony transformed our small balcony in central Tel Aviv into a real paradise. The design is elegant, the plants are thriving, and maintenance is simple. Highly recommended!"
home_p_26: "The professional and creative team at Urban Balcony created an amazing rooftop garden for us. They understood exactly what we wanted and realized our vision beyond expectations. Thank you so much!"
home_p_27: "After years of an empty balcony, we finally have a place we love to spend time in. The design is perfect for our urban lifestyle, and maintenance is minimal. Simply excellent!"
home_p_28: Contact us today for free consultation and discover how we can transform your balcony or rooftop into a dream space
about_h1_1: Our Story and Who We Are
about_h2_7: Our Professional Approach to Rooftop Garden Design
about_p_24: Urban Balcony was born from a deep love of nature and a desire to bring its beauty into modern urban life. We understood that residents of the central area, living in apartments and high-rise buildings, yearn for their own green corner - a place where they can relax, disconnect from routine, and connect with nature even in the heart of the bustling city.
about_p_25: Our journey began when we discovered that small balconies and urban rooftops are an untapped resource that can become amazing spaces of beauty and tranquility. We decided to specialize in rooftop and balcony garden design, turning each project into a unique story of transformation and creativity. Today, we are proud to be the leaders in urban gardening in central Israel.
about_p_26: Over the years we have developed unique expertise in dealing with specific challenges of urban balconies - space limitations, varying wind conditions and sun exposure, and minimal maintenance requirements. We combine deep botanical knowledge with advanced design sense, creating solutions that are both beautiful and practical.
about_p_27: To transform every urban balcony into a dream space that reflects the personality and style of its owners. We believe that every person deserves their own green space, and we work to make this vision a reality through professional design, personal service, and uncompromising commitment to quality.
about_p_28: To be the leading company in rooftop and urban balcony garden design in Israel, and to leave a mark of beauty and sustainability in every project. We aspire to create an urban gardening movement that enriches the quality of life for city residents and contributes to biodiversity and environmental well-being.
about_p_29: We treat each project as a unique work of art, and invest all our heart and soul in creating amazing spaces.
about_p_30: We are committed to the highest standards at every stage - from initial planning to ongoing maintenance.
about_p_31: We believe in responsible gardening that respects the environment and uses native plants and ecological methods.
about_p_32: We build trust relationships with our clients through open communication, fair pricing, and meeting deadlines.
about_p_33: Each client is a whole world for us. We listen, understand, and tailor solutions precisely to your needs.
about_p_34: We are always looking for new and refreshing solutions, combining current trends with timeless classics.
about_p_35: The Urban Balcony team consists of experienced landscape designers, professional gardeners, and professionals who love what they do. Each of our team members brings unique experience and genuine passion for creating urban green spaces. We work as a cohesive team, committed to the success of every project and client satisfaction.
about_p_36: All team members have undergone professional training in landscape design, botany, and installations.
about_p_37: Many years of experience in designing and executing complex projects on urban balconies and rooftops.
about_p_38: We believe in open and transparent communication, and update you at every stage of the project.
about_p_39: At Urban Balcony we believe that every project is unique and requires a personally tailored approach. Our work process begins with truly listening to your needs, dreams and lifestyle. We don't offer generic or template solutions - every design is created especially for you.
about_p_40: We combine deep botanical knowledge with understanding of urban gardening challenges. We know which plants will thrive in the specific exposure conditions of your balcony, how to solve drainage problems, and how to create a space that will remain beautiful and functional over time. Our approach combines careful planning with precise execution and attention to every small detail.
about_p_41: We also believe in education and knowledge transfer. At the completion of each project, we provide comprehensive guidance for ongoing maintenance, including tips for watering, pruning, and fertilizing. Our goal is not only to create a beautiful garden, but also to empower you to maintain it and enjoy it over time.
about_p_42: At Urban Balcony we believe that urban gardening should be responsible and sustainable. We work to minimize the environmental impact of our projects and encourage urban biodiversity. This includes using native plants that require less water and care, smart irrigation systems that conserve water, and organic fertilizers that don't pollute the environment.
about_p_43: We also encourage our clients to adopt environmentally friendly gardening practices, such as composting, rainwater collection, and creating habitats for butterflies and bees. We believe that every urban balcony can contribute to the urban ecosystem and improve air quality and city life.
about_p_44: Smart irrigation systems and drought-resistant plants
about_p_45: Recycled raw materials and environmentally friendly solutions
about_p_46: Preference for native plants adapted to the climate
about_p_47: Ready to start the journey to transform your balcony? Contact us for free consultation

contact_h3_5: We'd love to hear from you and help bring your rooftop garden design vision to life
contact_p_16: Fill out the form and we'll get back to you soon. We're available for any question, consultation, or quote.
contact_p_23: Contact us by phone or WhatsApp and we'll be happy to answer any question
contact_p_24: Duration depends on the size and complexity of the project. A small balcony project can take 3-5 working days, while a large rooftop garden project can take 2-3 weeks. We'll provide you with a detailed timeline during the planning stage.
contact_p_25: Yes! We offer various maintenance plans tailored to your needs - from monthly visits to quarterly maintenance. We'd be happy to provide more details.
contact_p_26: The initial consultation includes a site visit, space assessment, discussion of needs and budget, and initial design suggestions. The initial consultation is provided at no cost.
contact_p_27: We specialize in the central area, but we'd be happy to consider projects in additional areas. Contact us and we'll check the possibility.

services_h1_1: Our comprehensive rooftop garden design services
services_h2_2: Comprehensive planning and design of rooftop gardens
services_h2_3: Comprehensive Rooftop Garden Planning and Design
services_p_24: Our planning and design service begins with a personal consultation meeting on your balcony or rooftop. We listen to your vision, understand the unique needs and challenges of the space, and offer creative solutions tailored to your budget. Our professional team specializes in designing rooftop gardens that combine modern urban aesthetics with practical functionality.
services_p_25: We create detailed plans that include sketches, selection of plants suitable for sun and wind conditions, planning of comfortable seating areas, and smart irrigation solutions. Each plan is personally customized to your personal style and urban lifestyle. We consider every small detail to create a space you'll love spending time in.
services_p_26: Our planning and design service begins with a personal consultation meeting on your balcony or rooftop. We listen to your vision, understand the unique needs and challenges of the space, and offer creative solutions tailored to your budget. Our professional team specializes in designing rooftop gardens that combine modern urban aesthetics with practical functionality.
services_p_27: We create detailed plans that include sketches, selection of plants suitable for sun and wind conditions, planning of comfortable seating areas, and smart irrigation solutions. Each plan is personally customized to your personal style and urban lifestyle. We consider every small detail to create a space you'll love spending time in.
services_p_28: Professional planting is the foundation for a thriving, long-term garden. We carefully select resilient plants suitable for Israeli climate conditions and the specific characteristics of your balcony or rooftop. Our team specializes in urban ornamental plants, herbs, and seasonal flowers that add color and vitality to the space.
services_p_29: We use quality soils and advanced planting methods that ensure optimal absorption and healthy plant development. Each plant is selected according to the amount of sun, shade, and wind in your space. Additionally, we provide detailed guidance for ongoing maintenance and automatic irrigation systems that simplify daily care.
services_p_30: Professional planting is the foundation for a thriving, long-term garden. We carefully select resilient plants suitable for Israeli climate conditions and the specific characteristics of your balcony or rooftop. Our team specializes in urban ornamental plants, herbs, and seasonal flowers that add color and vitality to the space.
services_p_31: We use quality soils and advanced planting methods that ensure optimal absorption and healthy plant development. Each plant is selected according to the amount of sun, shade, and wind in your space. Additionally, we provide detailed guidance for ongoing maintenance and automatic irrigation systems that simplify daily care.
services_p_32: Flooring is a central element in designing your balcony or rooftop. We offer a variety of quality flooring solutions including natural or synthetic wood decking, durable ceramic tiles, and modular flooring solutions that can be easily installed and replaced in the future. All our solutions are resistant to extreme weather and designed to withstand intensive daily use.
services_p_33: Our designer decking upgrades the overall appearance of the space and creates a warm, inviting feeling. We specialize in professional installation that ensures proper drainage, long-term stability, and perfect aesthetic appearance. Additionally, we offer integrated floor lighting solutions that create a magical atmosphere in the evening hours.
services_p_34: Flooring is a central element in designing your balcony or rooftop. We offer a variety of quality flooring solutions including natural or synthetic wood decking, durable ceramic tiles, and modular flooring solutions that can be easily installed and replaced in the future. All our solutions are resistant to extreme weather and designed to withstand intensive daily use.
services_p_35: Our designer decking upgrades the overall appearance of the space and creates a warm, inviting feeling. We specialize in professional installation that ensures proper drainage, long-term stability, and perfect aesthetic appearance. Additionally, we offer integrated floor lighting solutions that create a magical atmosphere in the evening hours.
services_p_36: Proper lighting can transform your balcony or rooftop into a magical space in the evening hours. We specialize in planning and installing smart lighting systems that combine functional lighting with ambient lighting. Our solutions include weather-resistant lighting fixtures, energy-efficient LED lighting, and systems that can be controlled from your smartphone.
services_p_37: We create lighting plans that highlight beautiful plants, illuminate pathways and seating areas, and add depth and dimension to the space. Each lighting system is adapted to the character of the overall design and incorporates decorative elements such as hanging lanterns, LED strips, and ecological solar lights.
services_p_38: Proper lighting can transform your balcony or rooftop into a magical space in the evening hours. We specialize in planning and installing smart lighting systems that combine functional lighting with ambient lighting. Our solutions include weather-resistant lighting fixtures, energy-efficient LED lighting, and systems that can be controlled from your smartphone.
services_p_39: We create lighting plans that highlight beautiful plants, illuminate pathways and seating areas, and add depth and dimension to the space. Each lighting system is adapted to the character of the overall design and incorporates decorative elements such as hanging lanterns, LED strips, and ecological solar lights.
services_p_40: The right furniture and accessories complete the design and create a comfortable, inviting space. We offer a wide range of quality outdoor furniture solutions including comfortable armchairs, dining tables, designer benches, and smart storage solutions. All furniture is carefully selected to match the overall design style and withstand extreme weather conditions.
services_p_41: We specialize in modern and elegant furniture that combines comfort with aesthetics. Our solutions include durable outdoor cushions, designer umbrellas, decorative vases, and unique garden accessories that add character and personality to the space. We work with leading suppliers to ensure high quality and long-term durability.
services_p_42: The right furniture and accessories complete the design and create a comfortable, inviting space. We offer a wide range of quality outdoor furniture solutions including comfortable armchairs, dining tables, designer benches, and smart storage solutions. All furniture is carefully selected to match the overall design style and withstand extreme weather conditions.
services_p_43: We specialize in modern and elegant furniture that combines comfort with aesthetics. Our solutions include durable outdoor cushions, designer umbrellas, decorative vases, and unique garden accessories that add character and personality to the space. We work with leading suppliers to ensure high quality and long-term durability.
services_p_44: To maintain the perfect appearance of your urban garden, we offer comprehensive ongoing maintenance services. Our professional team conducts regular visits for pruning, fertilizing, irrigation, and ecological pest control. We ensure your plants remain healthy and thriving throughout the year.
services_p_45: Our maintenance services also include replacing seasonal plants, repairing irrigation systems, and general cleaning of the balcony or rooftop. We offer a variety of flexible maintenance plans tailored to your needs and budget. With Urban Balcony, you can relax and enjoy your garden without worrying about maintenance.
services_p_46: To maintain the perfect appearance of your urban garden, we offer comprehensive ongoing maintenance services. Our professional team conducts regular visits for pruning, fertilizing, irrigation, and ecological pest control. We ensure your plants remain healthy and thriving throughout the year.
services_p_47: Our maintenance services also include replacing seasonal plants, repairing irrigation systems, and general cleaning of the balcony or rooftop. We offer a variety of flexible maintenance plans tailored to your needs and budget. With Urban Balcony, you can relax and enjoy your garden without worrying about maintenance.
services_p_48: At Urban Balcony we believe in sustainable and responsible gardening. We offer ecological solutions including rainwater collection systems, small balcony composters, and use of local plants that require less water and care. Our solutions reduce environmental impact and create an environmentally friendly garden.
services_p_49: We use organic fertilizers, natural pest control methods, and recycled raw materials when possible. Our team specializes in creating small ecosystems that attract butterflies, bees, and birds to your balcony. This is not only beautiful but also contributes to urban biodiversity.
services_p_50: At Urban Balcony we believe in sustainable and responsible gardening. We offer ecological solutions including rainwater collection systems, small balcony composters, and use of local plants that require less water and care. Our solutions reduce environmental impact and create an environmentally friendly garden.
services_p_51: We use organic fertilizers, natural pest control methods, and recycled raw materials when possible. Our team specializes in creating small ecosystems that attract butterflies, bees, and birds to your balcony. This is not only beautiful but also contributes to urban biodiversity.
services_p_52: We meet on-site, listen to your wishes, and assess the space and possibilities.

services_p_54: Our professional team executes the work in an organized, clean and efficient manner.

legal_accessibility_p_15: Response times: We respond to accessibility inquiries within 3 business days and work toward resolution within 10 business days.
legal_accessibility_p_16: Complaints: You can file a complaint with the Ministry of Justice - Commissioner for Equal Rights for Persons with Disabilities
privacy_meta_description: Our privacy policy - how we collect, use and protect your information
legal_accessibility_li_27: Support for zoom up to 200% without content loss
legal_accessibility_li_28: Perceivable: Information is presented in ways that users can perceive
legal_accessibility_li_30: Understandable: Information and user interface are understandable
legal_accessibility_li_31: Robust: Content can be interpreted by a variety of technologies
services_meta_description: Comprehensive rooftop garden design services: planning, planting, maintenance and flooring solutions. Urban Balcony offers customized urban balcony solutions for every urban balcony.
accessibility_meta_description: Our accessibility statement - our commitment to digital accessibility
